description: Athens bars all but essential travel from Serbia for a week as infections steadily rise.
title: Coronavirus: Greece bars Serbian visitors as Balkans cases rise
title_page: Coronavirus: Greece bars Serbian visitors as Balkans cases rise - BBC News
maintext: But for the moment, numbers are nowhere near the peak levels seen in countries such as the UK, the US and Sweden. So when Serbians see pictures of British tourists sunning themselves on Adriatic beaches, it would be understandable if they nursed a sense of injustice.
